argumentText:
ARGUMENT
n x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscygodd.1 | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | iscygodd.o | |- O = ( od ` G ) |
| 3 |  | iscygodd.3 | |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 |  | iscygodd.4 | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | iscygodd.5 | |- ( ph -> ( O ` X ) = ( # ` B ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_odcl | |- ( X e. B -> ( O ` X ) e. NN0 ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( O ` X ) e. NN0 ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ph -> ( # ` B ) e. NN0 ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` G ) e. _V |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 11 |  | #P_hashclb | |- ( B e. _V -> ( B e. Fin <-> ( # ` B ) e. NN0 ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( B e. Fin <-> ( # ` B ) e. NN0 ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` G ) = ( .g ` G ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) x ) ) = B } = { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) x ) ) = B } |
| 16 | 1, 14, 15, 2 | #P_cyggenod | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ B e. Fin ) -> ( X e. { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) x ) ) = B } <-> ( X e. B /\ ( O ` X ) = ( # ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 3, 13, 16 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( X e. { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) x ) ) = B } <-> ( X e. B /\ ( O ` X ) = ( # ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 4, 5, 17 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ph -> X e. { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) x ) ) = B } ) |
| 19 |  | #P_ne0i | |- ( X e. { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) x ) ) = B } -> { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) x ) ) = B } =/= (/) ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) x ) ) = B } =/= (/) ) |
| 21 | 1, 14, 15 | #P_iscyg2 | |- ( G e. CycGrp <-> ( G e. Grp /\ { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) x ) ) = B } =/= (/) ) ) |
| 22 | 3, 20, 21 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> G e. CycGrp ) |
